body.name: Atopskins 1080P HD Wireless Doorbell Camera with Ring Chime, Outdoor Camera, Cloud and Local Storage Support, 2.4G Wi-Fi - Ideal Video Doorbell Camera for Apartments
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 17 mins
features: 💖【1080P Full HD Image & Night Vision】: Capture clearer real-time images and videos with the 1080P HD Resolution and 166° ultra-wide-angle lens. The built-in infrared night vision light enhances visibility in low-light conditions, allowing for detailed and distortion-free images, day or night.

💖【PIR Motion Detection & 2-Way Audio Voice Changing】: The built-in PIR sensor accurately detects motion and changes, providing instant push notifications. Use the 2-way audio feature with the built-in microphone and speaker to make remote video calls and easily communicate with visitors or warn strangers. The voice changer function enhances security and convenience.

💖【Cloud Storage & Free Local Storage】: Enjoy the flexibility of cloud storage and local storage options. Record alarm events and automatically upload them to the cloud with a 7-day event recording (30-day free trial, paid subscription required thereafter). The local storage feature allows for video saving on a 64G SD card (not included), ensuring access even without internet connectivity and no subscription fees.

💖【Rechargeable Battery & Long-Distance Signal】: Say goodbye to frequent battery replacement with the doorbell's 18650 rechargeable batteries. The low-power wireless technology ensures a stable wifi signal connection. No more worries about signal loss or lack of sound.

💖【Wireless Doorbell Camera, Easy To Install】: The package includes everything you need for easy installation. Simply choose an ideal location, download the "Ubox" application from Google Play/App Store, connect the doorbell to your home WiFi network (2.4G), and pair it with your mobile device using Ubox for the convenience of a wireless doorbell. Leave us a message if you have any questions.

Video Tutorial How to pair a video doorbell? Click to view the video tutorial. Step 1-2: Download the UBOX APP from the APP Store, register a account and log in; Step 3-4: Choose to add a device,then remove the battery compartment； Step 5-7: Set up your device and wifi information, connect to the wifi network; Step 8-9: When you hear the tone, please use your device camera to scan the QR code on your phone, and wait for the device to connect； Step 10: The device prompts you that the pairing has been successful.

Package for Atopskins Smart Video Doorbell Camera Kit Wireless Vdeo Doorbell x 1 ; Wireless Indoor DoorBell Buzzer x 1Rechargeable Battery x 2 ( Packed In the main body ); USB Charging Cable x 1Adhesive Tape for no drill installation x ; Screw Pack x 1USB Charging Cord x 1; User Manual x 1

Why can't I pair my ring video doorbell camera with my cell phone? Before pairing the doorbell, please make sure that you are in a 2.4GHz WIFI network environment and that your mobile phone Bluetooth is turned on at the same time. Why do I turn on WIFI and Bluetooth at the same time, WIFI is 2.4GHz, and I still can't pair successfully? Please try to press and hold the reset button on the ring camera doorbell for 5S. When you hear the voice reminder that it has been reset, you can re-pair according to the previous pairing steps, and the pairing will be successful. Is there a charge for the cloud storage function of the ring camera doorbell? We provide each device with a free 30-day cloud storage privilege, which can store pictures or video content for 7 days. What is the charging standard for cloud storage? When you use it for more than 30 days, the cloud storage function needs to be charged. The specific charges are subject to the specific charges on your device. Will the memory card be given away with the package? Sorry, the memory card is not included in the package. You need to buy an additional memory card before you can perform the local storage function.
